title: Bug 120216 - Group dialog should be displayed even if the dataset is not set.
description: When attempting to open the group dialog, an error is displayed. This behavior is contrary to our template requirements, where we don't want the UI to perform validation.
OB: An error is shown when trying to open the group dialog.
EB: The group dialog should be displayed even if the dataset is not set. The UI should not perform validation in this scenario as per our template requirements.
SR:
To reproduce the issue:
1. Launch the application.
2. Go to the 'Groups' section.
3. Try to open the group dialog without setting a dataset. The error should appear when it shouldn't.
